description: Locations to access fresh, local seafood throughout the city of Boston and environs. Categories include: publicly accessible fishing locations, farmers' markets with fresh day boat fish, and fish CSA distribution points. Seafood retail locations to come! Accurate as of August 2012: please contact with corrections and updates. Source database available on OpenData. PDF.
